hero.title: Transform Your Real Estate Business
hero.subtitle: Streamline property management, client relationships, and analytics with our cutting-edge platform designed for modern real estate professionals.

features.subtitle: A platform built entirely for real estate professionals. Built by you, for you.
features.ctaText: Ready to transform your real estate business? Explore our platform features.

journey.subtitle: Follow our roadmap as we build the ultimate real estate platform together.
journey.ctaText: Ready to be part of the journey? Join our development community and shape the future of real estate technology.
journey.limitedSpots: Limited spots available for Pre Alpha

preAlpha.title: Pre-Alpha
preAlpha.description: Core platform development with select industry partners.
preAlpha.details: Invite-only testing phase with 25 hand-picked real estate professionals.

keyFeatures.title: Analytics
keyFeatures.description: Basic reporting tools with export capability

keyFeatures.title: Feedback
keyFeatures.description: Direct developer and product design access

closedAlpha.title: Closed Alpha
closedAlpha.description: Extended testing with advanced features and integrations.
closedAlpha.details: Expanded to 100 beta testers with advanced analytics and MLS integration.

closedBeta.title: Closed Beta
closedBeta.description: Public beta with full feature set and performance optimization.
closedBeta.details: Open registration with complete feature set including AI-powered insights.

publicLaunch.title: Public Launch
publicLaunch.description: Full public launch with enterprise features and global expansion.
publicLaunch.details: Complete platform launch with enterprise-grade security and global support.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for your business needs.
pricing.bottomCtaText: Want to learn more about our development journey and upcoming features?

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individual agents getting started

alpha.name: Pre Alpha
alpha.description: Help us shape the future of real estate software

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Oikion and how it can help your real estate business.
faq.ctaText: Ready to join our development journey? Help us shape the future of real estate technology.

questions.question: Will there be a mobile app available?
questions.answer: Absolutely! A full-featured mobile app is planned for our Closed Beta phase.

questions.question: When will AI-powered features be available?
questions.answer: AI-powered insights and automation will roll out during our Open Beta phase.

questions.question: What are the planned CRM & MLS integrations?
questions.answer: Major MLS integrations will launch with our Closed Beta.

questions.question: Will enterprise features be available at launch?
questions.answer: Yes! Enterprise-grade security, white-label solutions, and advanced API access will be available at our Official Launch.

questions.question: How can I influence the UX design?
questions.answer: Join our Closed Alpha to directly shape Oikion's development!

questions.question: What happens to my data as new features are added?
questions.answer: Your data remains secure and accessible throughout all development phases.

questions.question: Will there be team collaboration features?
questions.answer: Team collaboration tools will be introduced during our Open Beta phase.

questions.question: Can I get lifetime pricing by joining early?
questions.answer: Yes! Closed Alpha participants receive lifetime founder pricing with 40% discount.

questions.question: Will Oikion support international markets?
questions.answer: Global expansion is planned for our Official Launch.

questions.question: What advanced analytics will be available?
questions.answer: Advanced analytics evolve through each phase: basic reporting in Alpha, enhanced dashboards in Closed Beta, AI-powered insights in Open Beta.

finalCta.title: Stay Updated with Oikion Insights
finalCta.subtitle: Get the latest real estate insights, market trends, and exclusive updates delivered straight to your inbox.

newsletter.preAlphaDescription: Get early access and help shape the future of Oikion
